## User StoreValue

### User
This data structure is stored in the `user` store.

```typescript
interface UserStoreValue {
    id: String;
    firstName: String;
    lastName: String;
    email: String;
    internalUser: Boolean;
    touAccepted: Boolean;
    piiAllowed: Boolean;
    emailAllowed: Boolean;
    phone: String;
    createdAt: String;
    updatedAt: String;
    profile: {
        id: String;
        userId: String;
        institutionId: String;
        userInputInstitution: String;
        displayName: String;
        publicInfoAllowed: Boolean;
        majorId: String;
        userInputMajor: String;
    },
    roles: Array<{ id, name, key }>;
    federations: null /* needs more info */
};
```
